```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    i := 45

    switch {
    case i < 10:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 10")
    case i < 50:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 50")
    case i < 100:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 100")
    }
}
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    i := 45
    switch {
    case i < 10:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 10")
        fallthrough
    case i < 50:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 50")
        fallthrough
    case i < 100:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 100")
    }
}
```

```
i is less than 50
i is less than 100
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    i := 45
    switch {
    case i < 10:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 10")
        fallthrough
    case i < 50:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 50")
        fallthrough
        fmt.Println("Not allowed")
    case i < 100:
        fmt.Println("i is less than 100")
    }
}
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    switch char := "b"; char {
    case "a":
        fmt.Println("a")
    case "b":
        fmt.Println("b")
        break
        fmt.Println("after b")
    default:
        fmt.Println("No matching character")
    }
}
```
